DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present 3 armed placebo control parallel group randomized control trial is to explore the extent to which osteopathic manipulative treatment is effective in reducing pain in a population of complicated newborns.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Osteopathic Manipulative Treatment on Reduction of Pain in Complicated Newborns: RCT
DOC.criteria: newborns born in the same hospital either gender diagnosis of any pathological/clinical medical condition lack of guardian consent newborn transferred to/from other hospital lack of any of the inclusion criteria
